content.text:
# 1977 Alan King Tennis Classic – Doubles

Bob Lutz   Stan Smith
| runner   =  Bob Hewitt   Raúl Ramírez
| score    = 6–3, 3–6, 6–4
| edition  = 6
| type     = singles doubles
}}
Second-seeded Bob Lutz and Stan Smith won the title, defeating top-seeds Bob Hewitt and Raúl Ramírez in the final.
